amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: ? SEC. __. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used by the Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA) to implement, administer, or enforce the termination of the hotel and motel emergency sheltering program established by FEMA for families displaced by Hurricane Katrina and other hurricanes of the 2005 season.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds from being available to implement, administer, or enforce the termination of the hotel and motel emergency sheltering program established by FEMA for families displaced by Hurricane Katrina and other hurricanes of the 2005 season.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee amendment (A049) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 230 (Roll no. 63).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A049) offered by Ms. Lee.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
